tool_description: Manages individual guest dietary accommodations by tracking special meal assignments and ensuring each guest's needs are met.

guest_dietary_profiles.description: Guest profiles with names and dietary requirements

available_menu_options.description: All available menu items including special dietary options

seating_assignments.description: Guest seating arrangements (table numbers or sections)

service_style.description: Meal service format (plated, buffet, family-style, stations)

error_messages: Missing guest profiles: Provide at least one guest dietary profile.
Empty menu options: Provide at least one menu option for accommodation matching.
Invalid service style: Use plated, buffet, family-style, or stations.
Profile format error: Guest profiles must include name and dietary requirements.
Menu option mismatch: Some dietary requirements cannot be met with available menu options.
Guest limit exceeded: Maximum 1000 guest profiles can be processed at once.
usage: Provide guest_dietary_profiles and available_menu_options arrays, plus service_style. Optionally include seating_assignments. Returns individual meal assignments and accommodation tracking.

total_accommodations.description: Total number of special dietary accommodations needed

individual_assignments.description: Specific meal assignments for each guest with dietary needs

unmet_requirements.description: Dietary requirements that cannot be accommodated with current menu

service_instructions.description: Special serving instructions for wait staff

kitchen_notifications.description: Special preparation alerts for kitchen staff
